product.name: Modular Straw and Napkin Combo Dispenser

description.html:
The Modular Straw and Napkin Combo Dispenser is a two-in-one,
over-under design that provides easy access to both straws and napkins
to customers in one compact location. Featuring removable dividers for
condiments and flatware.

Features / Benefits

  • Over-under design for combined footprint
  • Integrated dispenser for wrapped beverage straws
  • High capacity napkin dispensing for less frequent refills
  • Raised presentation creates a high-end image
  • Rubber feet prevent slipping
